data.current_summary: Send search terms to receive the most relevant articles and companies.
data.summary_suggestion: Search for relevant articles and companies by keywords
data.description_suggestion: Searches for articles and companies matching the provided search terms. Accepts a query parameter containing one or more keywords. Returns a list of the most relevant articles and companies with metadata. This endpoint is part of the ContentPro feature set and may require additional access permissions. Results are ranked by relevance to the search query.
data.reasoning: Original description is empty, leaving AI agents unable to understand input requirements, output structure, or access restrictions. Added details about query parameter expectations, return value structure, ContentPro context, and ranking behavior for improved interpretability.

data.current_summary: The /contentpro-similar-text endpoint accepts and arbitrary piece of text and returns similar articles and blogs written by companies.
data.summary_suggestion: Find articles and blogs similar to provided text
data.description_suggestion: Accepts arbitrary text content and returns similar articles and blog posts written by companies. The request body should contain the text to match against. Returns a list of similar articles with company attribution, relevance scores, and snippets. This endpoint is part of the ContentPro feature set and may require additional access permissions. Useful for content discovery and competitive intelligence.
data.reasoning: Summary contains grammatical error ('and arbitrary' should be 'an arbitrary') and lacks clarity. data.current_summary: Send search terms to receive the most relevant companies along with text snippets.
data.description_suggestion: Searches for companies matching the provided search terms and returns relevant results with text snippets. Accepts query parameters for search keywords and optional filtering criteria. Returns a list of matching companies ranked by relevance, each with associated text snippets from their content. Snippets provide context about why each company matched the search query.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is empty, missing details about parameter expectations, response structure, and how snippets are generated. Added information about parameter types, ranking behavior, and snippet context to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Send a company website to receive a list of companies related to them.
data.description_suggestion: Identifies and returns companies similar to a specified company based on website URL or company identifier. Accepts parameters for the target company website or ID and optional filtering criteria. Returns a ranked list of similar companies with relevance scores and company metadata. Similarity is determined by business characteristics, industry, market positioning, and content analysis.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is empty, missing critical details about input format (website URL vs. company ID), response structure, and similarity criteria.
